clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Transcutaneous Acupoint Electrical Stimulation on Intestinal Obstruction After Gastrointestinal Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Transcutaneous Acupoint Electrical Stimulation on Intestinal Obstruction After Gastrointestinal Surgery in Adults

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

collaborator.agency: Ankang Hospital of Traditional Chinese Medicine
Affiliated Hospital of Shaanxi University of traditional Chinese Medicine
Central Railway Group of Xi'an Central Hospital
Xi'an Hospital of traditional Chinese Medicine

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

brief_summary.textblock: Postoperative intestinal obstruction (POI) is one of the most common complications in the gastrointestinal surgery. Compared with the conventional control group, transcutaneous acupoint electrical stimulation(TEAS) is possible to reduce the incidence of POI and accelerate the rapid recovery of the gastrointestinal tract.

detailed_description.textblock: Participants will be randomly assigned, in a 1:1 ratio, to receive TEAS or Blank treatment (acupoints selection are same with the experimental group, connect stimulator for patients, but not don't give stimulus). The randomization sequence will be computer-generated, and randomization will be performed in blocks and will be stratified according to participating center. TEAS will be performed in a series of time periods after operation. Time of first fart and food-taking ,time of have normal diet after the transplantation will be recorded. The participation of each patient is scheduled for 30 days.

primary_outcome.description: Whether or not to exhaust in 72 hours after surgery

secondary_outcome.time_frame: once a week for 30 days after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: the time of postoperative exhaustion and defecation.
the recovery time of bowel sounds

secondary_outcome.measure: adverse reactions of digestive after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: the incidence and score of distention, abdominal pain, nausea and vomiting after surgery.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: once a week for 30 days after surgery
once a week for 30 days after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: the leaving bed time,normal diet recovery time,post-operative hospitalization duration

arm_group.description: Choose several acupoints,give 2/10 hz dilatational wave stimulation.Complete the 30 minutes intervention after extubation and 1-3 days after surgery.Give a health education on the first postoperative day.
The choice of acupoints are same with TEAS group,tape over the electrode but don't give electroacupuncture stimulation,the others steps are same with TEAS group.

intervention.description: Transcutaneous acupoint electrical stimulation is same to the traditional Chinese medicine acupuncture treatment,treat diseases by stimulate different acupuncture points.
the choice of acupoints are same with TEAS group,tape over the electrode but don't give electroacupuncture stimulation.

overall_official.affiliation: First Affiliated Hospital of Xian JiaotongUniversity
